entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
